REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f4564 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-REC 03-17 0044

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET RECEIVES NO MORNING ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it did not operate in the money market in the morning session. Earlier, the central bank had estimated the deficit in the system today at some 450 mln stg. REUTER
